price: Wọ́n ń páyà Olúwa wọn tó ń bẹ lókè wọn. Wọ́n sì ń ṣe ohun tí À ń pa láṣẹ fún wọn.¹
arabic: يَخَافُونَ رَبَّهُم مِّن فَوۡقِهِمۡ وَيَفۡعَلُونَ مَا يُؤۡمَرُونَ۩
footnotes: 1. Ẹ tún wo ìtọsẹ̀-ọ̀rọ̀ sūrah al-’Ani‘ām; 6:18 àti sūrah al-Mujādilah; 58:7.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yakhāfūna rabbahum min fawqihim wayafʿalūna mā yu'marūna
